Code Changes :
--------------
1. Add cloud plug-in
      <!-- [START cloudplugin] -->
      <plugin>
        <groupId>com.google.cloud.tools</groupId>
        <artifactId>appengine-maven-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>2.2.0</version>
        <configuration>
          <!-- can be set w/ -DprojectId=myProjectId on command line -->
          <projectId>myProjectId</projectId>
          <!-- set the GAE version or use "GCLOUD_CONFIG" for an autogenerated GAE version -->
          <version>GCLOUD_CONFIG</version>
        </configuration>
      </plugin>
      <!-- [END cloudplugin] -->

2. Exclude tomcat dependency
    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
      <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId>
      <version>${spring.boot.version}</version>
            <!-- Exclude Tomcat so that it doesn't conflict w/ Jetty server -->
      <exclusions>
        <exclusion>
          <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
          <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-tomcat</artifactId>
        </exclusion>
      </exclusions>
    </dependency>
3. Add servlet dependency
<!-- Include Servlet API -->
    <dependency>
      <groupId>javax.servlet</groupId>
      <artifactId>javax.servlet-api</artifactId>
      <version>4.0.1</version>
      <scope>provided</scope>
    </dependency>
4. Add Servlet class
public class ServletInitializer extends SpringBootServletInitializer {
  @Override
  protected SpringApplicationBuilder configure(SpringApplicationBuilder application) {
  return application.sources(<YourApplication.class>);
  }
}

5. Add App Engine Configuration
Add a src/main/webapp/WEB-INF/appengine-web.xml

<appengine-web-app xmlns="http://appengine.google.com/ns/1.0">
  <version>1</version>
  <threadsafe>true</threadsafe>
  <runtime>java8</runtime>
</appengine-web-app>


Deployment Steps for a Spring boot (Maven) project into AppEngine
-----------------------------------------------------------------
1. Download Google cloud SDK
2. Open terminal > run : gcloud init
3. run : gcloud app create
3. run : mvn clean package
4. run : mvn clean package appengine:run
5. run : mvn clean package appengine:deploy -Dapp.deploy.projectId=<project_id>

Reference :
https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/getting-started-java/blob/master/appengine-standard-java8/springboot-appengine-standard/pom.xml
